name: Nail Art
description: Express yourself with our creative and chic Nail Art services. From elegant French tips to bold, bespoke designs, our nail technicians turn your nails into tiny masterpieces.

processSteps.title: Nail Prep & Care
processSteps.description: Your session begins with professional nail care. We shape, buff, and prepare your nails, ensuring a healthy and perfect canvas for the artwork.

processSteps.title: Detailed Artistry
processSteps.description: Choose from our portfolio or bring your own inspiration. Our skilled technicians use high-quality polishes and fine tools to meticulously paint your chosen design.

processSteps.title: Top Coat & Finish
processSteps.description: We seal your new nail art with a durable, high-gloss top coat. This protects the design, prevents chipping, and ensures your masterpiece lasts as long as possible.

commitment.title: Precision & Detail
commitment.description: Our nail artists are celebrated for their steady hands and attention to the smallest details, ensuring a flawless finish.

commitment.title: Your Style, Realized
commitment.description: We listen to your ideas and preferences to create nail art that truly reflects your personality and complements your style.

commitment.title: Hygiene & Safety
commitment.description: Your health is our priority. We use sterilized tools and high-quality, non-toxic products for every client.

commitment.title: Trendsetting Designs
commitment.description: Our artists are always up-to-date with the latest trends, techniques, and colors to offer you the most fashionable nail art.

commitment.title: Long-Lasting Wear
commitment.description: We use professional-grade polishes and application techniques to maximize the life of your nail art, keeping it beautiful for weeks.

careTips.title: Wear Gloves for Chores
careTips.description: Protect your nail art from harsh cleaning chemicals and prolonged water exposure by wearing rubber gloves.

careTips.title: Apply Cuticle Oil Daily
careTips.description: Keep your cuticles and the skin around your nails hydrated. This promotes healthy growth and prevents hangnails.

careTips.title: Be Gentle
careTips.description: Use the pads of your fingers, not your nails, to open cans or scrape things. Your nails are jewels, not tools!

careTips.title: Schedule Regular Fills
careTips.description: For gel or acrylic art, book regular appointments every 2-3 weeks to maintain the look and health of your nails.

faqs.question: How long will my nail art last?
faqs.answer: With proper care, a regular polish manicure can last up to a week, while a gel manicure can last 2-3 weeks without chipping.

faqs.question: I have short nails. Can I still get nail art?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! There are many beautiful designs that look fantastic on short nails, from simple geometric patterns to elegant half-moons. We can help you choose the perfect one.

faqs.question: How do you ensure hygiene?
faqs.answer: We adhere to the highest standards of sanitation. All metal tools are medically sterilized in an autoclave, and we use disposable files and buffers for each client.

faqs.question: Can you do a design I found on Pinterest?
faqs.answer: Yes! We love when clients bring in inspiration. Show us your picture, and our artists will do their best to replicate it or create a unique version just for you.

faqs.question: How long does a nail art appointment take?
faqs.answer: A standard nail art session on top of a manicure typically adds 30 to 60 minutes, depending on the complexity of the design. We'll give you a time estimate when you book.
